h2_title: Where to Find First Prince of Flowing Sands
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands
content: Other general attacks include alternating hand slams that come in 1 or 2 hit successions. He can also put his hand down to the side first, and then sweep it across the front in a slower swipe that you’ll need to dodge back from instead of moving alongside his hand.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'First_Prince_of_Flowing_Sands.md', within the main section titled 'First Prince of Flowing Sands', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find First Prince of Flowing Sands' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
Other general attacks include alternating hand slams that come in 1 or 2 hit successions. He can also put his hand down to the side first, and then sweep it across the front in a slower swipe that you’ll need to dodge back from instead of moving alongside his hand.
